languages.text: "Организовать вывоз такого количества добра — дело серьезное. Нужен целый грузовой флот и отдельная навигация для него".
"Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."
languages.original_text: "Организовать вывоз такого количества добра — дело серьезное. Нужен целый грузовой флот и отдельная навигация для него".

traits.locale_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."
"Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires a entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

"Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."
"Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

languages.text: “运输这么多贵重的资源，组织工作不容忽视。想要妥善完成这项严肃任务，恐怕需要一支技艺精湛的货运舰队。”
languages.original_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

traits.locale_text: “运输这么多贵重的资源，组织工作不容忽视。想要妥善完成这项严肃任务，恐怕需要一支技艺精湛的货运舰队。”

languages.text: 「これほど多くの貴重品を輸送するとなれば、一大事業だ。専用の航法を持った貨物船団が一隊丸ごと必要になる」
languages.original_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

traits.locale_text: 「これほど多くの貴重品を輸送するとなれば、一大事業だ。専用の航法を持った貨物船団が一隊丸ごと必要になる」

languages.text: «Organizar el transporte de tanta mercancía valiosa es una tarea compleja. Requiere toda una flota de carga con navegación dedicada».
languages.original_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

traits.locale_text: «Organizar el transporte de tanta mercancía valiosa es una tarea compleja. Requiere toda una flota de carga con navegación dedicada».

languages.text: "Den Transport so vieler Wertgegenstände zu organisieren, ist eine schwere Aufgabe. Eine ganze Frachtflotte mit eigener dedizierter Navigation ist dafür erforderlich."
languages.original_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

traits.locale_text: "Den Transport so vieler Wertgegenstände zu organisieren, ist eine schwere Aufgabe. Eine ganze Frachtflotte mit eigener dedizierter Navigation ist dafür erforderlich."

languages.text: "Bunca değerli eşyanın nakliyesini organize etmek ciddi iştir. Kendi özel rotacılık sistemine sahip bir kargo filosu gerektirir."
languages.original_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

traits.locale_text: "Bunca değerli eşyanın nakliyesini organize etmek ciddi iştir. Kendi özel rotacılık sistemine sahip bir kargo filosu gerektirir."

languages.text: « Organiser le transport de tant de précieuses marchandises est une entreprise sérieuse. Cela nécessite une flotte commerciale entière, dotée de son système de navigation autonome. »
languages.original_text: "Organising the transportation of so many valuables is a serious undertaking. It requires an entire cargo fleet with its own dedicated navigation."

traits.locale_text: « Organiser le transport de tant de précieuses marchandises est une entreprise sérieuse. Cela nécessite une flotte commerciale entière, dotée de son système de navigation autonome. »
